Sequence Information.Peptide Name: PtesALF1 (PtALF1, Portunus trituberculatus anti-lipopolysaccharide factor isoform 1; natural AMPs; Crustaceans, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; BBS)

Literature Information.Literature: Host expression: The mRNA transcripts was detected in all the examined tissues. ALFs are constitutively expressed in eyestalk.Activity: Recombinant fusion protein containing this peptide is active against bacteria (Liu Y et al., 2012) Gram- V. alginolyticus L59 (MIC 0.5-1.01 uM), P. aeruginosa P25 (MIC 1.01-2.01 uM), Gram+ M-luteus M2 (MIC>64.3 uM), S-aureus S7 (MIC >64.3 uM), and fungus P. pastoris GS115 (MIC 8.04-16.08 uM).Recombinant production:bacteria:Escherichia coli: has been expressed in inclusion bodies, prufied and refolded for antimicrobial assays. Expression is induced by IPTG (1 mM). UPdated 7/2021; 10/2023
Literature Information.Author: Liu Y, Cui Z, Luan W, Song C, Nie Q, Wang S, Li Q.2011
Literature Information.Title: Three isoforms of anti-lipopolysaccharide factor identified from eyestalk cDNA library of swimming crab Portunus trituberculatus
